title: Video: Beach House – Lazuli
body:
Adopting a vaguely sci-fi theme, the video for **Beach House’s** _Lazuli_ has a credit’s list the length of your arm.

One of the highlights from their recently released fourth album Bloom, the video stars Kira Blazek, Ronald Thomas, Peter Boustani and John Brodeur and was directed by Allen Cordell. Flickering futuristic imagery and excessive usage of neon lighting forms the majority of the visuals, shifting between dimensions, and seemingly, states of mind. Check it out below.
